review: My friend suggested me Dr. Archana Ramesh for my pregnancy. My experience with her has been super exciting and less worry. She is a very very friendly doctor which is a big plus. i recommend visiting her for pregnancy or any gynec related health issues.

Dr Archana Ramesh is patient friendly doctor. She is experienced and very professional. I was scared about pregnancy and child birth. But she gave confidence,suggestions during my pregnancy...now i delivered cute baby girl(mahalakshmi) delivery was smooth ,not painful. I m very happy to meet her.  I'm 100% satisfied with the service. I remember her lifelong.....
Thank you...
Dr ARCHANA RAMESH

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have been seeing Dr. Archana Ramesh since many years and even before she was working in Motherhood Hospital. When she stopped coming to sagar hospitals I basically searched where she is and found her in Motherhood. The consultation is high comparabily here but I prefer to see only Dr. Archana Ramesh for any Gyneacolgical related health issues. I feel extremely comfortable talking to her Because her patience settles me down and does not panic me. Very happy with her treatment as well.
